page.title: 08HEALTH CENTRE
page.content: The Centre is situated in the middle of the Main Street and it has been open since 1967. There are 3 permanent doctors,{Dr.D.Redmond,}his wife{ {Dr.Sandra Redmond}and{Dr.Barbara {Mercer}.Also there is one temporary trainee,Dr.Mc Ilroy.Other employees include two district nurses,one health visitor,two full time receptionists and one part time receptionist.The Centre approximately caters for 4,600 people.As well as usual surgery hours there is also a weekly baby and Ante-Natal care clinic.At weekends if the centre is closed,patients may contact Dr.Kane's or Dr. Simpson's practices in Ballymena.
